data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Director Jones,
I ____ came ____ the ____ you ____. They ____ been ____ put ____ an ____ desk ____. While I would ____ willing ____ hand ____ over, you ____ have ____ plans. Let me know how you would like to deal with them.
data.partBlankContent:
Director Jones,
I rece____ came acr___ the fi___ you ment_____. They h__ been carel_____ put in__ an o__ desk dra___. While I would b_ willing t_ hand th__ over, you m__ have ot___ plans. Let me know how you would like to deal with them.
data.fullContent: Director Jones, I recently came across the files you mentioned. They had been carelessly put into an old desk drawer. While I would be willing to hand them over, you may have other plans. Let me know how you would like to deal with them.
data.answer: 琼斯主管， 我最近看到了你提到的文件。它们被不小心放进了一个旧抽屉里。虽然我愿意将它们移交给你，但你可能有其他计划。让我知道你想如何处理他们。
